sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const testimonials = [ { name: "Sarah L.", text: "I love how I can make extra money by delivering packages on my way to work!" }, { name: "John D.", text: "Finding rides in my area has never been easier. Great community feel!" }, { name: "Emma W.", text: "As a student, this app helps me save money on rides and earn some by delivering." } ] const Testimonials = () => { return (

Community Voices

{testimonials.map((testimonial, index) => (

{testimonial.name}

"{testimonial.text}"

))}
) } export default Testimonials
